mapper.update: update good set gname = #{gname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serialNumber = #{serialnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, stock_number = #{stockNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, gname, serialNumber, price, stock_number, create_time from good
